institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 12 (Conclusion of Consortium Agreement)
contents: Article 12 (Conclusion of Consortium Agreement) The organization that has been notified of the selection of a joint training center pursuant to Article 10 of the Regulations shall immediately submit an agreement signed with the contracting (small and medium-sized) enterprise in accordance with Form No. 4 of the Business Manual, “National Human Resources Development Consortium Agreement.” A copy must be registered with the Vocational Competency Development Information Network (hereinafter referred to as *HRD-Net).
